name: Thumbzine
tag_list: mobile, platform, technology, magazine, publisher, content, entertainment
overview:
Original Mobile Magazines, Books and Promotional Publications

Thumbzine merges state of the art technology and high-end creative design to deliver the best in original mobile entertainment experiences for mobile consumers worldwide.

At Thumbzine they create original mobile content publications in-house and in partnership with publishers and brands, which we in-turn distribute through carriers and high volume off-deck distributors reaching millions of mobile consumers across the globe with high impact mobile entertainment experiences that both entertain users and build major brand recognition at the same time.
